entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 08:40 AM EDT Sunday 01 May 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 6.0°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 01 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 01 May 2016
